root.name: Walt Disney's The Jungle Book
root.description: The Jungle Book is a side-scrolling platformer based on the Disney film of the same name. As Mowgli, you must make your way from your home in the jungle to the human village. Along the way, you face various dangers such as pitfalls, monkeys throwing fruit at you, and snakes that spit at you. The ultimate objective is to defeat Shere Khan, a cunning tiger who hunts humans.
